mapper.insert: insert into pet(pet_no, member_id, pet_type, pet_name, pet_gender, pet_breed, pet_birth, pet_weight, pet_neutralization) values(pet_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{petType}, #{petName}, #{petGender}, #{petBreed}, #{petBirth}, #{petWeight}, #{petNeutralization})
mapper.select: select * from pet where member_id=#{memberId} order by pet_no asc
